name: Princess's Request
description:
Enter an epic story with princess, knights and thieves. You may encounter some familiar faces if you've played Princess's pet before. If you didn't, well, you won't be missing anything important.

This is a game I made in 3 weeks or so while messing around with RPG maker (that a lovely friend of mine gave me). It's pretty bare boned tbh. But it's short and kinda sweet, so please give it a try if you like my humor.

There will be 3 ending (the 3rd ending has 2 branches). Here's a guide to getting them

http://princess-s-pets.tumblr.com/post/14598818958...

Known bugs:

+Music files corrupted for no reason (won't stop you from playing, though)

+I know Actor5 is in there somewhere.... But I can't find him. I guess we aren't mean for each others.

Please contact me if you encounter any bugs or lagging issue. Thank you~

EDIT: DOWNLOAD'S back. I have included a version with RTP if you have fast connection and 100MB more disk space to spare just in case (The no RTP version can still run normally even with bug, though)
